EmailTemplate.description: Campaign prospects for NA registered for the APAC webinar- total 28 identified. This email copy should re-direct them back to the NA registration again.
EmailTemplate.name: webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-03-04 NA.Invite.APAC Prospects resend for NA
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Webinar and Demo: Risk Management Engine
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar - Tricentis Tosca Testsuite: Innovate Faster with the Risk Management Engine
Tuesday, March 4, 2014 1:00 p.m. - 2:00 p.m EST (New York, Boston, Miami)
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-03-04.html>
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Due to a technical problem, you may not have been registered for the webinar “Tricentis Tosca Testsuite: Innovate Faster with the Risk Management Engine,” to take place on Tuesday, March 4, 2014 at 1:00 p.m. EST.
Please register again!
We apologize for any inconvenience.
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-03-04.html> This email was sent to {{lead.First Name}}. If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <http://go.tricentis.com/u/491XCL8930000wJ004o1D00> at any time. If you have questions about Tricentis webinars, feel free to contact us <mailto:Tricentis%20Webinar%20%3cwebinar@tricentis.com%3e>.
